body:
- Updated few flags in `AOCC` patches for `WRF v.3.9.1.1`

- Added 2 new patches for `AOCC 3.1` and `3.2` for compiling `WRF v4.2`

Raised the same request earlier : https://github.com/spack/spack/pull/27952
 Re-initiating the pull request as there were intermediate merges after the pull request. 

We have also raised the pull request with WRF for AOCC support, once going forward we may not need to add new patches for WRF from AOCC side.

Ref link: https://github.com/wrf-model/WRF/pull/1684
title: AOCC patches for WRF 3.9 and 4.2
